abbie_talk1_abbie1.name: Abbie
text: Hey... Welcome to the shop...
...Buy something or leave please...

abbie_talk1_zaine1.name: Zaine
text: You seem a bit down
Is everything okay?

abbie_talk1_abbie2.name: Abbie
text: I don't feel like talking to customers anymore...
...Please buy something or leave.

abbie_talk1_zaine2.name: Zaine
text: And why's that?

abbie_talk1_abbie3.name: Abbie
text: Everyone that enters this store eventually goes insane...
...When they come back they attack me or they try to steal from me...
I prefer not talking to customers anymore as that makes...
"Dealing with them"
...easier...

abbie_talk1_zaine3.name: Zaine
text: Wait, what do you mean...?
What's causing them to go insane?

abbie_talk1_abbie4.name: Abbie
text: Listen I don't really know how it works, okay?
I'm just telling you what happens every time.

abbie_talk1_zaine4.name: Zaine
text: Well how do you know they're insane then?
Maybe they're just trying to get some free stuff...
I really doubt this [color=green]Dungeon[/color] is causing anyone to go insane

abbie_talk1_abbie5.name: Abbie
text: I [tornado radius=7 freq=3.0]KNOW[/tornado] they're insane beacause [shake rate=20.0 level=15]THEY DIDN'T ACT LIKE THAT BEFORE!!![/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=15]And that STUPID chant THEY say EVERY TIME IS DRIVING ME NUTS!![/shake]
[shake rate=20.0 level=15]SO AGAIN, will you PLEASE buy something or LEAVE?![/shake]

abbie_talk1_zaine5.name: Zaine
text: ...Sorry...
I'll leave now...
